task.primary_goal: Identify the most similar globally famous fictional character to the person/character in the uploaded image.
subtasks: Analyze the look, style, and vibe of the uploaded character.
Select a single, highly recognizable fictional character from popular media (cartoon, comic, anime, film, TV, or video game) who best matches.
Generate a high-quality composite image showing the famous character standing next to the original character in a selfie pose.

composition.framing: Medium-close selfie (head and shoulders), both subjects in frame, one character holding an invisible camera (partial arm visible).
composition.expressions: Both characters smiling or matching the original expression for a candid, friendly appearance.
composition.pose: Characters lean in towards each other naturally.

original_character.notes: No alteration, treat as real subject.

selection_criteria: Best match for look or vibe from major pop culture
If multiple matches, pick the single most globally iconic
If uploaded image closely resembles a copyrighted character, choose a different but iconic character in that genre
famous_character.visual_style: Faithful to iconic appearance (costume, silhouette, key facial features), but harmonized in detail/style to match original photo.

visual_consistency: Lighting, color temperature, and perspective matched to photo
Background: original retained, slightly softened for focus, no added text/logos

quality.style: Photo-blended or photorealistic as appropriate to uploaded image
quality.respect: No sexualized, violent, political, or hateful content. Friendly only.

output.requirement: A single final image (PNG) showing the original person/character taking a selfie with one famous fictional character.
